text: Rizzo the Rat is a Muppet, who was voiced by Steve Whitmire. He was first in The Muppet Show. He is known for being in a double act with Gonzo the Great. Rizzo is a rat with a New Jersey accent. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:Muppets Category:Fictional mice and rats de:Die Muppet Show#Rizzo
title: Rizzo the Rat
